text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain Stock Exchange director says a decision on listing foreign companies in the bourse will be taken before the end of the year.
- Bahrain, Algeria to coordinate on fighting terrorism.
- Five million shares changed hands on Wednesday on the Bahrain Stock Exchange.
- A Bahrain-U.S. joint venture company wins $14.3 deal to build an offshore jack-up barge in Bahrain. The floating platform is used to carry out repair and maintenance work on offshore oil rigs.
